first_para: Kathryn Sloan (Katy) Clark (born 3 July 1967) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Ayrshire and Arran since 2005.

full.extract: Kathryn Sloan (Katy) Clark (born 3 July 1967) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Ayrshire and Arran since 2005.
full.title: Katy Clark
